title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO AGREEMENT AND / OR CONTRACTS WITH THE SERVICE PROVIDERS FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF ACTIVITIES / OR FESTIVITIES IN CELEBRATION OF THE 24™ BANAMOS FESTIVAL IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TOWN'S 410™ FOUNDATION ANNIVERSARY THIS COMING SEPTEMBER 16 TO 20, 2025 AND RATIFYING THE SAME THEREAFTER. Author
